tasks.title: Task 1
tasks.body: Your first task is to get chat access token from one of our REST API endpoints. This token will be later on used in another task. To retrieve token send a POST request to the following URL: "https://api1.iflychat.com/api/1.1/user/create". The request should contain one parameter named "app_id" and its value should be "fbd1156d-6e12-45ba-8a1c-01271ced5ece".
tasks.footer: Create a separate page (say Task 1) like Dashboard for this task.

tasks.title: Task 2
tasks.body: Your second task is to retrieve online user list by making GET request to the following URL: "https://api.iflychat.com/users/list/:token/c-g" where :token is to be replaced with actual token from Task 1.
tasks.footer: Create a separate page (say Task 2) like Dashboard for this task.

tasks.title: Task 3
tasks.body: Refresh the data retrieved from the Task 2 every 2 minutes.
tasks.footer: Use the page corresponding to Task 2 for this task.
